hero.title: Automate Your Raid Preparation
hero.subtitle: Stop manually checking if your raid members have done their duty. Automate Discord reminders for vault progress, enchants, gems, and more with WoWAudit integration.

overview.title: Automate Raid Preparation for free
overview.subtitle: Stop manually checking raid readiness. Let automation do the work for you with WoWAudit integration.

discordReminders.title: Automated Discord Reminders
discordReminders.description: Tired of checking if your raid members have done their duty? Already using WoWAudit? Automate Discord reminders to check vault progress, enchants, gems, and more. Remind players before the week ends or shame those who didn't complete last week's vault.

advancedTracking.title: Advanced Raid Tracking
advancedTracking.description: Comprehensive tracking system for all aspects of raid preparation. Monitor Great Vault progress, enchant quality, gem requirements, item levels, crest caps, and wishlist age. Set detailed requirements for each equipment slot and track historical vault completion.

comingSoon.title: More Features Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're constantly working on new features! Planned additions include automatic role management based on guild ranks and M+ scores, guild activity quests, and much more. We'd love to hear your suggestions!

discordReminders.title: Automated Raid Preparation Reminders
discordReminders.description: Are you tired of manually checking if your raid members have fulfilled their duties? Do you already use the great tool WoWAudit? Automate Discord reminders for players who haven't met requirements. Remind them before the week ends to fill their vault, or call out those who didn't do it last week. Send automated messages checking everyone's enchantments and gems right before raid start. In the future, you'll also be able to check if everyone's Raidbot sims are up to date in WoWAudit.

advancedTracking.title: Comprehensive Raid Preparation Tracking
advancedTracking.description: Advanced tracking system that monitors every aspect of raid readiness. Set detailed requirements for Great Vault slots, enchant quality per equipment slot, gem requirements, item levels, crest caps, and wishlist age. Track historical vault completion and ensure consistent raid preparation across your guild.
highlights: Great Vault slot & requirement tracking with historical data
Per-slot enchant quality requirements (main hand, off hand, jewelry, etc.)
Detailed item level requirements for all equipment slots
Crest cap monitoring and wishlist age tracking

greatVaultManagement.title: Great Vault Progress Tracking
greatVaultManagement.description: Specialized tracking for Great Vault completion and requirements. Set minimum slot requirements at specific item levels, track raid, dungeon, and open world slots separately. Monitor historical vault completion to ensure consistent weekly progress.
highlights: Flexible Great Vault slot requirements with item level thresholds
Separate tracking for raid, dungeon, and open world activities
Customizable slot selection and requirement combinations

comingSoon.title: Exciting Features in Development
comingSoon.description: Many more features will be added in the future! We're working on automatic Discord role management based on guild ranks and Mythic+ scores, guild activity quests to encourage group play, and much more. Have an idea? We'd love to hear what you have in mind!
highlights: Automatic role assignment based on guild rank

cta.title: Ready to Automate Your Raid Preparation?
cta.description: Join guild leaders who have stopped manually checking raid readiness. It's completely free!

legal.disclaimer: Blingtron is not affiliated with Blizzard Entertainment or World of Warcraft.
legal.dataProtection: Your data is protected and never shared with third parties.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.liabilityText: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

battlenet.title: Select Your Region
battlenet.subtitle: Choose your Battle.net region to log in

actions.title: Actions
actions.subtitle: Manage action triggers and automation rules

communities.title: Communities
communities.noCommunitiesDescription: You haven't created any communities yet. Click 'Create Community' to get started.
communities.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this community? This action cannot be undone.
communities.name: Name
communities.unassignDiscordServerConfirmation: Are you sure you want to unassign this Discord server from the community? This action can be reversed later.
communities.discordConnected: Discord server connected with bot active
communities.noDiscordServers: You don't have any Discord servers where you're an admin. Invite the bot to your server to get started.
communities.noWoWGuilds: You don't have any WoW guilds where you have officer rank or higher.

admin.description: Welcome to the Blingtron Admin Panel. Manage your communities and automated reminders for raid preparation.
features: Create and manage multiple communities with different locales
Set up automated WoWAudit reminders for raid preparation
Configure Great Vault slot requirements and item level checks
Set enchant quality requirements for different gear slots
Schedule weekly reminders with flexible timing
Send automated Discord notifications for raid readiness
tips: Start by creating a community in the Communities section
Select a community before creating reminders
Use the 'Run Now' feature to test reminders immediately
Configure Great Vault requirements based on your guild's raid difficulty
troubleshooting: If reminders aren't working, verify your Discord webhook URL is correct
Ensure you have selected a community before managing reminders
Check that your WoWAudit spreadsheet key is valid

wowauditTeams.title: WoWAudit Teams
wowauditTeams.noTeamsDescription: You haven't created any WoWAudit teams yet. Click 'Create Team' to get started.
wowauditTeams.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this WoWAudit team? This will affect any reminders using it.
wowauditTeams.selectCommunityFirst: Please select or create a community first to manage WoWAudit teams.
wowauditTeams.name: Team Name

error.title: Error
error.deleteFailed: Failed to delete WoWAudit team. Make sure no reminders are using this team.

help.spreadsheetKey: Go to wowaudit.com, select your guild, go to settings, and copy the spreadsheet key.
help.apiKey: Enter your WoWAudit API key. This is required for the team to function properly.

reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.noRemindersDescription: You haven't created any reminders yet. Click 'Create Reminder' to get started.
reminders.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder? This action cannot be undone.
reminders.selectCommunityFirst: Please select or create a community first to manage reminders.
reminders.createWowauditTeamFirst: You need to create at least one WoWAudit team before you can create reminders. WoWAudit teams are required to track raid readiness.
reminders.name: Name
reminders.nowHint: can take up to three minutes

error.title: Error
error.wowauditKeyRequired: WoW Audit Spreadsheet Key is required

help.wowauditTeam: Select a WoWAudit team to use for this reminder. Each team corresponds to a WoWAudit spreadsheet.
help.noWowauditTeams: You don't have any WoWAudit teams yet.
help.wowauditKey: Go to wowaudit.com, select your guild, go to settings, and copy the spreadsheet key.
help.discordWebhook: Create a Discord webhook in your server settings: Server Settings → Integrations → Webhooks → New Webhook. Copy the webhook URL and paste it here.
help.minEmbellished: Minimum number of embellished items required on gear (crafted items with special effects).
help.minJewelrySockets: Minimum number of sockets required on jewelry (rings and necklace).
help.grateVaultRequirement: Define the minimum number of Great Vault slots at specific item levels. For example: 2 slots at 504 item level and 3 slots at 704 item level.
help.grateVaultSlots: Select which Great Vault slots should be checked (Raid slots 1-3, Dungeon slots 4-6, Open World slots 7-9).
help.historicalGrateVaultRequirement: Historical requirements check past weeks' vault slots to ensure consistent completion.
help.historicalGrateVaultSlots: Select which historical vault slots should be tracked over previous weeks.
help.enchantQuality: Select the minimum enchant quality for each equipment slot. Choose 'Disabled' to skip checking that slot, or select Quality Level 1-4 to require specific enchant quality.
help.checkOffhandEnchantClasses: Select which class/role combinations should have their off-hand enchants checked (relevant for dual-wielding classes).
help.enabled: Enable or disable this reminder. Disabled reminders will not run automatically.
help.wishlistAgeMythic: Maximum age in hours for mythic wishlist items before they are considered outdated.
help.wishlistAgeHeroic: Maximum age in hours for heroic wishlist items before they are considered outdated.
help.wishlistAgeNormal: Maximum age in hours for normal wishlist items before they are considered outdated.
help.itemLevelOverall: Minimum overall item level requirement for the character.
help.allUpgrades: Require all possible item upgrades to be completed before considering the character ready.
help.tierItems: Number of tier items the character should have equipped.
help.raidBuffPercentage: Percentage of raid buff the character should have.
help.mythicplusScore: Minimum Mythic+ score requirement for the character.
help.requireRareGems: Require all gem slots to be filled with rare quality gems or better.
help.requireEpicGem: Require at least one epic quality gem to be socketed.
help.requireReshiiEpicFiber: Require the epic Algari Adventurer's gear with Reshii epic fiber enchant.

actions.title: Actions
actions.noActionsDescription: You haven't created any actions yet. Click 'Create Action' to get started.
actions.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this action? This action cannot be undone.
actions.name: Name
actions.enabledHelp: Enable or disable this action. Disabled actions will not trigger.
actions.eventBasedInfo: Event-based actions are triggered by specific events in your community.
actions.weeklyInfo: Weekly actions are triggered on a recurring weekly schedule.
actions.eventBasedDescription: This action will be triggered by specific events in your community. Configure the event conditions in the rulesets.
actions.weeklyDescription: This action will be triggered on a recurring weekly schedule. Configure the schedule in the rulesets.
actions.buildRuleDescription: Create a new rule for this ruleset
actions.customExpressionHelp: Enter a custom condition expression using available variables
actions.deleteRulesetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this ruleset? This action cannot be undone.
actions.deleteRuleConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this rule? This action cannot be undone.
actions.rulesetDescriptionHelp: Describe the purpose of this ruleset

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 100 characters
validation.rulesetNameMinLength: Ruleset name must be at least 3 characters
validation.rulesetNameMaxLength: Ruleset name must be less than 100 characters
